committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the creditability of certain service in determining the order of retention for competing employees in a reduction in force affecting the Federal Grain Inspection Service.

summary.text: Provides, with respect to any reduction in force in the Federal Grain Inspection Service, for the creditability of certain inspection services performed by inspection personnel before being hired by the Administrator of such Service without regard to laws governing appointments to the competitive service.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the creditability of certain service in determining the order of retention for competing employees in a reduction in force affecting the Federal Grain Inspection Service.
